column1: when did i say malaika told me  i dont even know her bhai chill karega. i half expected you to tell me directly man seeing the amount you used to tease me with her. chill hai ab. chill kar
arrey bro..i asked her if she told any of her friends! cause you said something about her birthday na that's why!
bhai one of my commerce friends who knew sakina through some camp found out and told me because he knows i'm her ex
ohhh!! because sakina was not there on her birthday! so i just asked her don't take me wrong bhai
chill kar ab kal milte hai
done.. and congratulations to you and your sister
